SEARCH
Package it.astromark.behavior.service

Interface NoteService

All Superinterfaces:
CrudService<Note,NoteRequest,NoteResponse,UUID>
All Known Implementing Classes:
NoteServiceImpl
public interface NoteService extends CrudService<Note,NoteRequest,NoteResponse,UUID>
Service interface for managing notes related to student behavior. Extends the generic CrudService interface to provide CRUD functionality for notes.

  • Method Summary

    Method

    create, delete, getById, update

  • Method Details

    • getNoteByStudentId

      List<NoteResponse> getNoteByStudentId(@NotNull @NotNull UUID studentId, @NotNull @NotNull Integer classId)
      Retrieves a list of notes for a specific student in a given class.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the UUID of the student
      classId - the ID of the class
      Returns:
      a list of `NoteResponse` objects representing the notes Pre-condition: The `studentId` and `classId` must not be null. The student and class associated with the provided IDs must exist. Post-condition: Returns a list of notes associated with the specified student and class.

    • view

      void view(@NotNull @NotNull UUID studentId, @NotNull @NotNull UUID noteId)
      Marks a specific note as viewed for a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the UUID of the student
      noteId - the UUID of the note Pre-condition: The `studentId` and `noteId` must not be null. The note associated with the `noteId` must exist and belong to the specified student. Post-condition: The note is marked as viewed for the specified student.
